name: Ibis Frankfurt Centrum

reviews.text: This hotel is a good choice for anyone who wants to be near the train station or near the river Main. It was a 5 minute walk to the train station, which was very convenient for us, but to get downtown was about a 30 minute walk. The hotel in itself is pretty nice, there is a cute lobby and a handy luggage storage room for when your train comes in early and your room isn't ready yet. Our room was pretty much average. It was clean and a good size (a 3 person room), and had an actual bed instead of a pull-out couch for my daughter (3rd person) to sleep in. The bathroom shower was excellent, because it had one knob for pressure and one knob for exact temperature (35 degrees, 40 etc.). The bathroom door wouldn't close, probably because of the high humidity in Germany it had expanded and couldn't be shoved into the frame. It didn't really matter because we were all family and would just not go into the bathroom if we knew someone was in there, but it could get uncomfortable if it were two friends staying there instead. All in all, this was an average but very conveniently located hotel that I would recommend to anyone planning on taking the train the next morning.
reviews.title: Very Convenient, Average Rooms
Depends on room
reviews.text: This hotel is within easy walking distance to the main train station. We found the rooms very clean. The only draw back depended on which room you had. Our room #315 had a nice sitting area as well as huge bathroom and sleeping area. The second room for our kids, #309 was so small someone had to get on the bed so the second person could go by to the bathroom. Plus your breakfast was an extra 9 Euro per person.

description: Location is everything: The ibis Frankfurt Centrum is within walking distance of Frankfurt main train station and a few steps from the Main promenade. The financial district, old town with the Römer town hall and the museums along the river Main are all just a short walk away. After a busy day, relax in a brand new high-tech bed and enjoy a unique level of sleeping comfort. The ibis Frankfurt Centrum has 233 air-conditioned rooms, and was completely renovated in 2010.
